```{r}
YTM1av<- (sum(B1)+sum(B2)+sum(B3)+sum(B4))/60
YTM2av <- (sum(B5)+sum(B6))/30
YTM3av <- sum(B7)/15
YTM4av<- (sum(B8)+sum(B9))/30
YTM5av <- sum(B10)/15
```


```{r}

s1<- YTM1av
YTM1c<- 1000*s1/200
YTM1v1<- YTM1c/(1+(s1/200))
YTM1i1<- sqrt((1000+YTM1c)/(1000-YTM1v1))
s2<- (YTM1i1-1)*2
```


```{r}
YTM2c<- 1000*YTM2av/200
YTM2v1<- YTM2c/(1+(YTM2av/200))
YTM2v2<- YTM2c/((1+s2/2)^2)
YTM2k<- 1000-YTM2v1-YTM2v2
YTM2i1<- (1000+YTM2c)/(YTM2k)
s3<- (((YTM2i1)^(1/3))-1)*2
```

```{r}
YTM3c<- 1000*YTM3av/200
YTM3v1<- YTM3c/(1+(YTM3av/200))
YTM3v2<- YTM3c/((1+s2/2)^2)
YTM3v3<- YTM3c/((1+s3/2)^3)
YTM3k<- 1000-YTM3v1-YTM3v2-YTM3v3
YTM3i1<- (1000+YTM3c)/YTM3k
s4<- (((YTM3i1)^(1/4))-1)*2
```

```{r}
YTM4c<- 1000*YTM4av/200
YTM4v1<- YTM4c/(1+(YTM4av/200))
YTM4v2<- YTM4c/((1+s2/2)^2)
YTM4v3<- YTM4c/((1+s3/2)^3)
YTM4v4<- YTM4c/((1+s4/2)^4)
YTM4k<- 1000-YTM4v1-YTM4v2-YTM4v3-YTM4v4
YTM4i1<- (1000+YTM4c)/(YTM4k)
s5<- (((YTM4i1)^(1/5))-1)*2
```

```{r}
f2<- ((1+s2)^2)/(1+s1)-1
f3<- ((1+s3)^3)/((1+s2)^2)-1
f4<- ((1+s4)^4)/((1+s3)^3)-1
f5<- ((1+s5)^5)/((1+s4)^4)-1
```

```{r}
lmat<- matrix(1:5, nrow=5, ncol=1)
lmat[1,1]<-1
lmat[2,1]<- log(YTM2av/YTM1av)
lmat[3,1]<- log(YTM3av/YTM2av)
lmat[4,1]<- log(YTM4av/YTM3av)
lmat[5,1]<- log(YTM5av/YTM4av)
print(lmat)
```


```{r}
fmat<- matrix(1:25, nrow=5, ncol=5, byrow=TRUE)
print(fmat)

fmat[2,1]<- ((1+s2)^2)/(1+s1)-1
fmat[3,1]<- ((1+s3)^3)/(1+s1)-1
fmat[4,1]<- ((1+s4)^4)/(1+s1)-1
fmat[5,1]<- ((1+s5)^5)/(1+s1)-1
fmat[1,2]<- 0
fmat[2,2]<- 1
fmat[3,2]<- ((1+s3)^3)/((1+s2)^2)-1
fmat[4,2]<- ((1+s4)^4)/((1+s2)^2)-1
fmat[5,2]<- ((1+s5)^5)/((1+s2)^2)-1
fmat[1,3]<- 0
fmat[2,3]<-0
fmat[3,3]<- 1
fmat[4,3]<- ((1+s4)^4)/((1+s3)^3)-1
fmat[5,3]<- ((1+s5)^5)/((1+s3)^3)-1
fmat[1,4]<- 0
fmat[2,4]<- 0
fmat[3,4]<- 0
fmat[4,4]<- 1
fmat[5,4]<- ((1+s5)^5)/((1+s4)^4)-1
fmat[,5]<- 0
fmat[5,5]<-1
print(fmat)

```
